events.catalyst: Elliott Management $1B stake with CEO replacement proposal
events.notes: Tier-1 activist. Elliott acquired $1B+ stake (Dec 18, 2025) and proposed CEO candidate. High-priority campaign targeting leadership change.

events.catalyst: Permira/Warburg Pincus take-private acquisition at $24.55/share
events.notes: SUPERSEDED: Starboard activist campaign led to take-private deal. $8.4B acquisition by Permira/Warburg Pincus announced Dec 21, 2025. $24.55/share (47% premium to Nov 10 price). Expected close H1 2026. Go-shop period ended Jan 23, 2026. Spread likely <2.5% (fails merger arb kill screen).

events.catalyst: Starboard Value 8.5% + Elliott 5%+ stakes in Bill Holdings
events.notes: Dual Tier-1 activists. Starboard 8.5% + Elliott 5%+. Cooperation agreement in place (4 new directors). Company exploring strategic alternatives/sale. Investor day H1 2026. Stock down 40% YTD.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on tabelecleucel for EBV+ PTLD
events.notes: CRL issued Jan 9, 2026. FDA requested new clinical trial.

events.catalyst: FDA decision on CUTX-101 for Menkes Disease
events.notes: APPROVED Jan 13, 2026 (1 day early). ZYCUBO (copper histidinate) approved as first and only treatment for Menkes disease. Granted Rare Pediatric Disease Voucher. Linked to TRD-20260107-FBIO-PDUFA (closed -9.6% on sell-the-news).
events.source: FDA PDUFA calendar, Fortress Biotech IR

events.catalyst: FDA decision on RGX-121 (clemidsogene) for Hunter Syndrome (MPS II)
events.notes: First gene therapy for Hunter Syndrome. FDA inspections passed with no objections. Review extended from Nov 2025 to include positive 12-month data. Orphan Drug, Rare Pediatric Disease, Fast Track, RMAT designations. Priority Review Voucher eligible if approved.
